bzh.plealog.bioinfo.api.data.sequence

Interface DSequenceAlignment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DSequenceAlignmentImplem

    public interface DSequenceAlignment
    This interface defines a multiple sequence alignment.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONSENSUS_NAME 
      static String REFERENCE_NAME 
      static int STANDARD_ALIGNMENT 
      static int TRANSLATED_ALIGNMENT 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int columns()
      Returns the number of aligned positions.
      PositionSpecificMatrix getPositionSpecificMatrix(String type)
      Gets a Position Specific Matrix.
      DSequenceAligned getSequence(int row)
      Returns a sequence given its position in the MSA.
      DSymbol getSymbol(int col, int row)
      Returns a symbol given its position in the MSA.
      int getType()
      Returns the type of alignment.
      int rows()
      Returns the number of aligned sequences.
      void setSpecialSequences(DSequence consensus, DSequence refSeq)
      Insert in the MSA a consensus sequence as well as a reference sequence.

    • Field Detail

    • Method Detail

      • columns

        int columns()
        Returns the number of aligned positions.

      • rows

        int rows()
        Returns the number of aligned sequences.

      • getSequence

        DSequenceAligned getSequence(int row)
        Returns a sequence given its position in the MSA. Parameter row is zero-based.

      • setSpecialSequences

        void setSpecialSequences(DSequence consensus,
                       DSequence refSeq)
        Insert in the MSA a consensus sequence as well as a reference sequence. Both sequences should be added at the top of the MSA, the reference being before the consensus.

      • getSymbol

        DSymbol getSymbol(int col,
                int row)
        Returns a symbol given its position in the MSA. Parameters col and row are zero-based.

      • getType

        int getType()
        Returns the type of alignment. One of DSequenceAlignment.XXX_ALIGNMENT constants.

      • getPositionSpecificMatrix

        PositionSpecificMatrix getPositionSpecificMatrix(String type)
        Gets a Position Specific Matrix.
        Parameters:
        type - one of the PositionSpecificMatrix XXX_MATRIX constants
        See Also:
        PositionSpecificMatrix
